title: november 3: we’re off to see the wizard
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, there’s no place like home: Maia uncovers the secret history of the Wizard of Oz. The classic film first aired on television today in 1956. Maia also talks about a forgotten instrument and its inventor. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
